content: {"locationId": "5757", "organizationId": "4880", "name": "SDA Community Services (Camp Verde)", "address1": "1406 N Boothill Dr", "address2": "", "city": "Camp Verde", "state": "AZ", "zipCode": "86322", "country": null, "phone": "928-567-4281", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://www.facebook.com/CVSDACS", "latitude": "34.59003", "longitude": "-111.86858", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Yavapai County, COUNTY:  Yucaipa", "languages": "English", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "This pantry combines free food and clothing services on Wednesday mornings until 1pm. The clothing pantry is open the same hours as the food pantry and includes various clothing and miscellaneous items donated for general distribution.  Clothing donations can be dropped off any day of the week and time of day next to the east wall of the building adjacent to the large car-port.   We accept all donations except furniture!", "notes": "We are generally on-site Wednesday mornings by 5:30am to begin registering people. However, we don't open to allow picking up food until the truck from St Mary's food bank has delivered food and left our parking lot. This can be between 9:00am to 10:00am. If you come early, be prepared for a wait!  We recommend people arrive before 12:30pm. We close at 1:00pm but are frequently out of items of food by 12:30pm.", "contactName": "Camp Verde SDA Community Services", "contactPhone": "928-567-4281", "contactEmail": "eldercvsda@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "Clothing Pantry", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, CSFP Program, Grocery / Client Choice, Indoor Service, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Outdoor Service, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "Dairy Free, Gluten Free, Nut Free, Vegan, Vegetarian", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Diapers, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Other, Pet Food / Supplies, Prepared Food / Grab and Go, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 44, "regionName": "St. Mary's Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "71a2fe75-eba6-4f29-916b-d3614dd69e78.png", "website": "https://www.firstfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "US Mountain Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "MST", "offsetHours": "-7", "schedules": ["Wednesday 5:30 AM-1:00 PM (Registration starts at 5:30am.
